br.com.lett.crawlernode.util

Class CommonMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.lett.crawlernode.util.CommonMethods

  • public class CommonMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains common methods that can be used in any class within crawler-node project.
    Author:
    Samir Leao

      • hasBinaryContent

        public static boolean hasBinaryContent(java.lang.String contentType)
        Check wether the string contentType contains identifiers of binary content. This method is mainly used by the Parser, when fetching web pages content.
        Parameters:
        contentType -
        Returns:

      • hasPlainTextContent

        public static boolean hasPlainTextContent(java.lang.String contentType)
        Check wether the string contentType contains identifiers of text content. This method is mainly used by the Parser, when fetching web pages content. Can be used to parse only the text of a web page, for example.
        Parameters:
        contentType -
        Returns:

      • modifyParameter

        public static java.lang.String modifyParameter(java.lang.String url,
                                               java.lang.String parameter,
                                               java.lang.String value)
        Modify an URL parameter with a new value
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to be modified
        parameter - the name of the paramter to have it's value modified
        value - the new value of the parameter
        Returns:
        an URL with the new value in the specified parameter
